Text:
I presume this is the same as the 2012 movie by the same name available for upload from tpb.?
Guess it's cut into 5 shows for tv?

far_kit,
The American broadcast was severely edited. AFG's release comes from the British broadcast via FoV's release. The Secret Of Crickley Hall originally was 3 x 58 min but BBC America needed space for commercials and so they cut out over 40 minutes and made it one long movie.

Since i am no fan of AFG here is my upload which has all 3 episodes. It has been on iTunes for weeks now. 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7820629/The_Secret_Of_Crickley_Hall
